title: Project: Parks Canada Children
body:
Staff from Parks Canada have submitted a list of national parks they would like added to the registry. The complete set of Canada's national parks should be reviewed and added, where appropriate.
[20230417_Parks_Canada_children.xlsx](https://github.com/ror-community/ror-updates/files/11254897/20230417_Parks_Canada_children.xlsx)

adambuttrick
04/13/2023, 17:43:13 | 04/13/2023, 17:43:13
comment_text: Request here is a bit confusing as the new entity referred to as Dulaty University appears to continue to use a variant form of the name on https://ror.org/014kyp779 (see: https://dulaty.kz/en/about-us/history-of-university.html#). Merger is referenced on the organization's site ("structure" section [here](https://dulaty.kz/en/study/pre-university-education)) and so should be handled in some fashion. I suppose a new record for the combined entity may be best, but I want to confirm that others don't think we should update and fold into https://ror.org/014kyp779.

---
arthurpsmith
04/21/2023, 20:16:57 | 04/21/2023, 20:17:11
comment_text: The history of the wikipedia page - https://kk.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%D0%9C%D2%B1%D1%85%D0%B0%D0%BC%D0%BC%D0%B5%D0%B4_%D0%A5%D0%B0%D0%B9%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%80_%D0%94%D1%83%D0%BB%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B8_%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8B%D0%BD%D0%B4%D0%B0%D2%93%D1%8B_%D0%A2%D0%B0%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7_%D3%A9%D2%A3%D1%96%D1%80%D0%BB%D1%96%D0%BA_%D1%83%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%80%D1%81%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%96&action=history - shows this was moved from the old "Taraz State University" label to the new "Regional University" label, so there is a case based on that for reusing the ROR id. I'm not clear on the relative size of the two universities that merged here, but the old "Pedagogical University" seems to have been pretty substantial in itself as far as I can tell.

So I think it would be best to create a new ID for the merged entity and set the old ones to inactive, pointing to the new id.
